pumpProbeStandardsSet.description: EU/PHEO standards set for biopsy analysis. Eu from spectroscopy cuvette, found to give good fit w/ biopsy sections. (This eu data were used in Tom's Sci. Transl. Med. paper) Pheo from cuvette found to give poor fit, so pheo here is from a biopsy sample, Sample set C. 1a3, field of view 2

pumpProbeStandard.name: pheomelanin
pumpProbeStandard.description: Pheomelanin from set c, case 1a3, FOV 2
